website_summaries.verdict: Lenovo's Miix 510 is an attractive Windows tablet/keyboard combo with top-notch performance and enough future-proofing that it can replace your current laptop.
pros: Equipped with both USB 3.0 and USB-C ports

customer_reviews.title: I wish they still made these
customer_reviews.text: Lenovo it the nail on the head when they made this, they got everything right, value performance looks, usability, battery life. For the money this was a Microsoft surface killer. I have taken this to meeting with clients with surface pros as soon as they use it they regret paying what they did considering the cost difference and that the machine performs just as well as its surface equivalent. I just wish Lenovo would make more of these in multiple configurations again
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Multiple technical problems
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard unreliable - keys frequently stick down. Catastrophic boot failure less than 3 months after buying it - the downloadable Lenovo USB boot creator failed to start it after about 24 hours trying to install it. Ordered a rescue USB through the post- will take weeks to arrive according to lenovo website. I've been left without a functioning portable computer a few days before a critical work deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. James A. Mchugh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

The Lenovo Miix 510 is a versatile 2-in-1 PC for you to take anywhere. With its sleek design and unique watchband hinges, plus performance to power through productivity tasks, the Miix can be used in virtually any situation.

feature_bullets: Turn heads when you take out this 2-in-1 PC with intricately-tooled watchband hinges. With a one-piece aluminum design and FHD touchscreen, the Miix 510 helps you stand out from the crowd.
Play Like A Pro - You’ll enjoy taking high-quality photos with the rear-facing 5 MP camera, then editing them in a snap by reattaching keyboard.
With high performance to power through tasks, and fast storage to open programs and files in a flash, you’ll get that presentation finished with time to spare before your next meeting.
